topic.title: Changing the DNS Server Configuration
topic.shortdesc:
You can change the DNS servers defined for the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade at any
time after installation.

section.p:
During software installation, the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade is configured with
up to two DNS server IP addresses. You change these addresses using the web
administration interface or the CLI.

li.p:
In the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade web administration interface, open the
System Configuration pane.

The System Configuration pane is available from the
System Panel section of the
Admin menu.

The DNS page appears, showing the
currently defined DNS servers and their IP addresses.
The Edit DNS dialog box appears.
Replace the DNS Server IP addresses with different ones as required.

body.p:
Upon completion of the DNS configuration change, a 250.001 Configuration
out-of-date alarm is raised temporarily, and then cleared
automatically by the system.
